document_data.symbol: Black Widow [[spider]] above a pair of crossed [[rapier]]s
document_data.mainbody: '''House Morcane''' was the ruling house of [[Lolth]]-worshiping [[drow]] in the  settlement of [[Szith Morcane]].
document_data.History: The house was overthrown on [[Marpenoth 12]], [[1372 DR]], by the worshipers of [[Kiaransalee]], who were chasing refugees from the destroyed [[Maerimydra]].
document_data.Members:
* [[Alisannara Morcane]]: High Priestess of Szith Morcane, turned into a [[ghost]].
* [[Tierak Morcane]]: Priestess of Lolth who fled the overthrow of Szith Morcane.
* [[Dessa sik-Morcane]]: Minor noble and a powerful [[barbarian]], taken prisoner by the [[cleric]]s of Kianransalee.
